benchmark_details.name: MLE-bench
benchmark_details.overview: MLE-bench is a benchmark for measuring how well AI agents perform at machine learning engineering. It consists of 75 ML engineering-related competitions curated from Kaggle to test real-world ML engineering skills.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate AI agents on ML engineering tasks using Kaggle competitions.

data.source: 75 Kaggle competitions curated to reflect core ML engineering skills.
data.annotation: Manually annotated problem types and complexity levels.

methodology.calculation: Percentage of attempts awarded any medal (bronze and above).
methodology.interpretation: Achieving medals indicates successful performance relative to human competitors.
methodology.validation: Local validation server checks the validity of submissions.
